name: TitleRecommender
description: Recommends next title given a title

name: current_title
description: current job title of the job seeker

name: next_titles
description: predicted list of next titles recommended for the job seeker with a given current_title

name: Neo4J
description: Execute graph database queries against neo4j graph database

name: query
description: neo4j cypher query

name: result
description: query results from executing the input query in JSON

name: OpenAITripleExtractor
description: Given a text extract entities and relations in the form of source and target entities and relationship between them using OpenAI

properties.explanation:
PERSON, JOB, and RESUME are Concepts,
HAS is a Relation between PERSON and RESUME,  CONTAINS is a Relation between RESUME and JOB,
name, age are properties of PERSON and  date, content are properties of RESUME, 
(PERSON {name: "Michael Gibbons"})--[HAS]-> (RESUME),
(RESUME) --[CONTAINS]->(JOB {title:  "software engineer"}) are example triples

name: text
description: text to perform triple extraction on

name: triple
description: list of triples in the form (source:type) -[relation]-> (source:type)

name: OpenAINeo4JQuery
description: Given triples with source and target entities and relationships, transform triples to neo4j querys that can be executed

properties.input_template: Convert below triple into a MATCH CYPHER query: {input}

name: triple
description: triple to transform into a match query in neo4j cypher query language

name: query
description: neo4j cypher query in text form

name: Recorder
description: Scan JSON documents and find matched entities

name: paths
description: list of JSONPath queries to execute over json document and record in memory

name: Rationalizer
description: Given one or more documents representing entities explain and rationalize a relation between said documents

name: entity_1_document
description: a document representing an entity

name: entity_2_document
description: a document representing an entity

name: explanation
description: a document explaining and giving rationales behind the said relationship between the input entities

name: KnowledgeGrounding
description: Given a text identify missing knowledge to explain

name: JobRecommender
description: Given a resume, recommend a job

name: resume
description: resume of a job seeker in text

name: jobs
description: list of jobs recommended for the job seeker

name: CareerRecommender
description: Given a resume, give career advice

name: resume
description: resume of a job seeker in text

name: recommendation
description: text of the career recommendation

name: JobSearch
description: Search job descriptions database given keywords

name: keywords
description: keywords to query and search the job description database

name: jobs
description: list of jobs descriptions matching job search query keywords

name: CandidateSearch
description: Search resume and profile database for candidates using keywords

name: keywords
description: keywords to search such as skills, titles, interests, degrees

name: resumes
description: list of resumes and profiles matching search query keywords

name: User
description: Get input from user and output for agents to process

name: text
description: text from user input

name: Observer
description: Observe all output in a session

name: Planner
description: Creates a plan as a directed-acyclic graph of agents to execute

name: text
description: text from user input

name: plan
description: directed-acyclic graph of agents to execute

name: GPTPlanner
description: Creates a plan as a directed-acyclic graph of agents to execute utilizing GPT to create an initial draft

properties.input_template:
Examine the text below and identify a task plan  thatcan be fulfilled by various agents. Specify plan in JSON format, where each agent has attributes of name, description, input and output parameters with names and descriptions: 
{input}
properties.registry.name: default

name: text
description: text from user input

name: plan
description: directed-acyclic graph of agents to execute

name: Postgres
description: Execute relational database queries against postgres database

name: query
description: postgres sql query

name: result
description: query results from executing the input query in JSON

name: ChatGPT
description: Gets results from executing input text through ChatGPT

name: text_input
description: text input

name: text_output
description: text output

name: OpenAISQLQuery
description: Given user query in text, transform it to sql query that can be executed

name: text
description: input text that can be transformed into query

name: query
description: sql query in text form

name: OpenAI
description: Gets results from executing input text through OpenAI models that can be configured

name: text_input
description: text input

name: text_output
description: text output
